headline: Show HN: I built an company information platform (falconchart.com)
description:
We have released the company information platform where you can see information of listed companies all around the world. You can use it for knowing the company profile, performance history when you research the market or investment to listed companies.

Description (English): https://blog.falconchart.com/en/20220709-release-falconchart...

URL: https://falconchart.com/en/landing-page
